description: "A spinoff company from Apple, full of bright minds that were poised to change the personal communications world before the rest of us were ready or even born! Their story is as fascinating as it's entertaining, an intimate view into the inner workings of innovation and the pitfalls of getting carried away with one's own vision without a proper focus on shipping a viable product."
